PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-02652021-04-08,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ISC
ActIndian Act
First Nations Elections Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the First Nations Election Cancellation and Postponement Regulations (Prevention of Diseases)
PrecisRegulations amending the FIRST NATIONS ELECTION CANCELLATION AND POSTPONEMENT REGULATIONS (PREVENTION OF DISEASES) in order to (1) extend the Regulations by six months and indicate that the Regulations are repealed on October 8, 2021; and (2) specify that any postponed or cancelled election must be held no later than December 31, 2021, and that no extended term can be past December 31, 2021.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0078 Publication Date: 2021-04-28
AttachmentsAttachment
